column1: (b) the person to whom the supply was made shall if such
person  is  a  registered  person  pay  as  output  tax  such
amount of the tax that was deducted by him as input tax as
exceeds the proper amount that should have been deducted
or deduct as input tax such amount as was deductible as
exceeds  the  actual amount  deducted  by him, as the  case
